items.title: Target Names Operating Chief Michael Fiddelke As New CEO
items.description: The company said that current CEO Brian Cornell will transition to the role of executive chair of the board of directors.

items.title: IOC, BPCL Reportedly Resume Russian Crude Purchase As Discounts Widen
items.description: Indian oil refiners had paused buying Russian oil earlier this month after US President Donald Trump had imposed a 50% tariff on Indian exports

items.title: Indian Markets Gain For Fifth Session, Nifty Ends Above 25,000 Led By Tech, FMCG
items.description: Broader markets outperformed even as Nazara Tech and Vedanta dragged. The Nifty index ended above 25,000 for the first time since July.

items.title: Vodafone Idea: Short-Term Breakout Play Ahead? SEBI Analyst Flags Key Levels To Watch
items.description: Technicals suggest a breakout above ₹7 could unlock targets up to ₹16.75.

items.title: Why Is Homebuilder Toll Brothers’ Stock Falling Premarket?
items.description: The homebuilder projected deliveries of 11,200 units for the fiscal year that ends on Oct. 31, at an average delivered price per home of $950,000 to $...
